sql_create_table.sql_create: create table point_view_setting (id integer primary key autoincrement,prj_name varchar, wellsize integer,welldepth integer,wellwater integer,wellmud integer,welllidtexture integer,welllidsize integer,state integer,elevation integer,offset integer,building integer,roadname integer,pointremark integer,puzzle integer,x integer,y integer);

create table line_view_setting (id integer primary key autoincrement,prj_name varchar, start_depth integer,end_depth integer,pipe_length integer,bureal_diff integer, embedded_way integer,texture integer,pipe_size integer,secttion integer, hole_count integer,used_count integer,amount integer,aperture integer,row_col integer, voltage integer,state integer, pressure integer,owner_ship_unit integer, line_remark integer,puzzle integer);
